title: Is the iMac Pro Actually Fast? (Speed Test) - Krazy Ken's Tech Misadventures
tags: Is the iMac Pro Actually Fast?
is the iMac Pro worth it?
description: This iMac Pro features a 14-core Xeon W and 128 GB of RAM. So, it's fast! But how much faster? Is the iMac Pro worth the money ($5,000 - $13,000)? Krazy Ken ran some tests. Let's look at the numbers.  Watch the iMac Pro unboxing?   Want more videos like this?   Subscribe for new content!   Watch another speed test!    Like the CC on Facebook   Follow the CC on Twitter   Follow Ken on Twitter: @Hildron101010  Krazy Ken's Tech Misadventures #49 - Is the iMac Pro Actually Fast? (Speed Test)  Contact the CC    Get film gear Ken uses   On a lower budget?    Want music for your videos?   (We use these guys a lot. They're good.) Amazon links are powered by the Amazon Associates Program.
